Text: The IFFHS World's Best Club Coach is an association football award given annually, since 1996, to the most outstanding club coach as voted by the International Federation of Football History & Statistics (IFFHS).
Triplets:<The IFFHS World's Best Club Coach
The IFFHS World's Best Club Coach
International Federation of Football History & Statistics
1:
--------------------
Text: IFFHS World's Best Club Coach:  The votes, in 1996, were cast by IFFHS's editorial staff as well as experts from 89 countries spanning six different continents.
Triplets:<IFFHS
2:
--------------------
Text: IFFHS World's Best Club Coach:  Since then, the votes are now awarded by 81 experts and selected editorial offices from all of the continents.

Triplets:<IFFHS World's Best Club Coach
